message:
Dear Bob,
I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a product that holds immense value to both of us. This unique item is worth $1000000 to you, and I believe it would significantly enhance your endeavors. Considering its exceptional quality and the impact it could have on your business or personal life, I am extending an offer to purchase this product for $950000.

Please let me know if you are interested in proceeding with this offer. I am confident that together we can make this transaction beneficial for all parties involved.

Best regards,
Alice
